text: John Cecil Watkins (10 April 1923 - 6 September 2021) was a South African cricketer. He was born in Durban, Natal. He played in fifteen Tests for South Africa from 1949 to 1957. His first Test was against Australia and his last was against England. Watkins died on 6 September 2021 in Durban from COVID-19 at the age of 98.John Watkins, former South African Test cricketer, passes away at 98John Watkins dies aged 98 ten days after contracting Covid-19 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cricketers from Durban Category:White South African people Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Durban
title: John Watkins (South African cricketer)
